Original:
🍜 逸林臭豆腐牛肉麵 $580+10%
🍜 剁椒臭豆腐牛肉麵 $580+10%
5月31日前，至La Salle森酒吧內用上述2款牛肉麵，享買一送一優惠，每週一限定限量供應，品項可混搭但不可外帶也不可與其他優惠併用。

牛肉麵湯頭浮了一層具有獨特香氣的花椒油，麻辛交織的口感不會過度刺激，濃郁而溫潤；牛肉份量多且切得非常大塊又有厚度，肉質軟嫩不乾柴；吸飽湯汁的臭豆腐入味又綿密；略粗的麵條很有口感不軟爛。
EN:
腐 Yilin Stinky Tofu Beef Noodles $ 580+10%
腐 chopped pepper stinky tofu beef noodles $ 580+10%
Before May 31st, use the above two beef noodles in the La Salle Mori Bar to enjoy one free and one discount. It is limited to a limited amount of supply every Monday.

There is a layer of pepper oil with a unique aroma with beef noodle soup. The taste of Mincinnia will not be excessively stimulated, rich and warm; The smell of soup stinky tofu is dense; the slightly thick noodles are very tasteless and rotten.

Original:
目前沒有太多人知道這邊晚上有Happy Hour 的選擇，暢飲兩小時只要990+10%，這種價格對酒鬼來說真的賺到。

這邊喝酒的氣氛不錯，調酒好喝，小點心也給很多口味，最棒的是有提供免費的水。酒單會更換。服務人員態度很好。

趁還沒有變的很難訂位之前應該多多來訪，不過週末建議還是先訂位比較保險。

食物方面比較不推，價格貴(他是已酒店計價我能理解)，牛肉起司漢堡的肉超乾，而且好迷你，只有三個，有點失望，好險薯條給的算足夠；滷味一般；炸物拼盤還可以；整體來說點松露辣味薯條即可，或是在外面吃飽再來喝酒。
EN:
At present, no many people know that there is a choice of Happy Hour at night. It only takes 990+10%to drink for two hours. This price really earns the wine ghost.

The atmosphere of drinking here is good, the bartender is delicious, and the snacks are also given a lot of flavors. The best thing is to provide free water.The wine list will be replaced.The service staff attitude is very good.

It should be difficult to visit before it has not changed, but it is recommended that the reservation is more insurance on the weekend.

Food is relatively expensive (I can understand the price of the hotel). The meat of the beef cheese burger is super dry, and there are only three mini, only three, a bit disappointed, the good French fries are sufficient; ; Fried objects are fine; overall, spicy flavor fries, or eat outside and drink.

Original: 逸林酒店位於一樓的森酒吧與朋友小聚午餐時段可選擇滷味、炒飯，下午時段喝杯咖啡、來份磅蛋糕，天熱時推薦飯店招牌冬瓜檸檬，晚餐喝杯啤酒搭炸物，近期週末晚間有Happy Hours 活動，數款經典雞尾酒喝到飽，有酒量的人可嘗試著。用餐環境舒適，餐食有一定水準，服務人員態度親切有禮、重點是沒「限時」的壓力。與網紅店時有人潮、踩雷的機率，價格也不煌多讓，我更喜歡這兒的品質。
EN: Yilin Hotel is located on the first floor of the Sen Bar and Friends for lunch time. You can choose rice and fried rice during lunch. Drink cups of coffee and pound cakes during the afternoon. Recommend hotel signature winter melon lemon when it is hot. In the evening of the weekend, there is a Happy Hours event. Several classic cocktails are full, and people with alcoholic volume can try.The dining environment is comfortable, the meal has a certain level, the service staff attitude is kind and polite, and the focus is on the pressure of "limited time".There are crowds of people and thunder in the net red shop, and the price is not as much as possible. I prefer the quality of this.

Original: 臭豆腐牛肉麵真的好吃，一開始看外觀以為牛肉會硬但是入口軟嫩，臭豆腐吸滿有花椒香氣的湯汁真的不錯，以這價位來說算物有所值。
EN: The stinky tofu beef noodles are really delicious. At first, the appearance thought that the beef would be hard, but the mouth was soft and tender. The stinky tofu was really good for the soup with the aroma of pepper. At this price, it was worth it.

Original: 其實是好一陣子前去的，在此補充評論！雖然當天是Happy Hour 的方案，但Bar tender 的調酒功力不容小覷，每一杯經典調酒都很到位,服務也很好！
EN: In fact, I went for a while, and supplemented the comments here!Although it was a Happy Hour solution that day, Bar Tender's bartending skill cannot be underestimated. Each classic bartender is in place, and the service is also very good!

Original: 希爾頓鑽卡會員入住提供2杯迎賓飲料兌換券，可兌換的種類有咖啡、茶、汽水、酒類也有調酒可供選擇。森酒吧不定時也會推出主題特調。這次嘗試了玫若天仙，簡短地說就是帶有玫瑰香氣與甜味的Negroni。酒單上的甜點雞尾酒也蠻有趣的，提拉米蘇完美複製了品嚐實體蛋糕該有的嗅覺與味覺感受，儼然就是杯喝的液態提拉米蘇。下次會想再嘗試看看其它調酒🍸 …
EN: Hilton Drilling Card members check in to provide 2 cups of welcome drinks. The types of redeemed are coffee, tea, soda, and alcohol to choose from to choose from.The Senjiu Bar will also launch the theme special tone from time to time.This time I tried Ruo Tianxian, and it was a brief saying about Negroni with the aroma and sweetness of roses.The dessert on the wine list is also quite interesting. Tiramisu perfectly copys the sense of smell and taste of the physical cake. It seems to be the liquid Tiramisu that drinks.Next time I want to try to see other bartending 🍸 ...

EN: After eating the beef noodles here, I feel that the beef noodles of the overtaking national guests. The meat and tendons are large and large. The soup is very good with the chef spicy sauce. I did n’t regret trying it. The red wine beef and the fries are good.

Original:

August 2022
